brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts three separate networks: voice, video, and data in a non-convergence network design.

Voice Network: This voice network diagram shows individual analog phones in offices connected back to a phone system PBX switch, which is located in Room A.

Video Network: This video network diagram shows individual TV's in offices connected to a video distribution system, which is located in Room B.

Data Network: This data network diagram shows individual PC's in offices connected to a switch, which is also connected to a server located in Room C.
